amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide $3 million for the Citizen Corps program.
amendment.purpose: And amendment to increase funding for the Office of Grants and Training by $3 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 249 (Roll no. 213).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Jackson-Lee (TX).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
